issue.title: [Rust] Use `Vec<u8>` for hash key instead
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10837](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10837). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Is faster and decouples hash from aggregate implementation.

comments.body:
